content: say eid ul adha mubarak in every langauge u know

I'm glad you asked about Eid ul Adha greetings in different languages. Here are some examples:

1. Arabic: عيد مبارك كامل كان ويسفروا بهجتهم الى المساجد (Eid Mubarak Kamil Kan Wa Yasiruha Ilal Masajid)
2. English: Eid ul Adha Mubarak (Happy Feast of Sacrifice)
3. Urdu: عید مبروک عید الاضحى (Eid-e-Mubarak Id-e-Azha)
4. Bengali: বিদ্যাদิতে শুভে রাত্রি এইদুলআধা (Shubho Ratri Eidul Adha)
5. Hindi: एक-दुसरे को शुभ रात्रि ईद ul आधा (Ek Dusre Ko Shubh Raatri Id-e-Azha)
6. Malayalam: ഓന്നാതിൽ ശുഭതശ്ശാത്തുള്ള രാത്രി ഈദുല്‍ ആധ (Onnathil Shubhathastham Idul Adha)
7. Pashto: د اوبه نوره د ايد الاضحى (D Aube Norah Eid-e Azha)
8. Turkish: Bayramlarınız Kutlu Olsun Eid ul Adha (May your Bayrams be blessed, Eid ul Adha)
9. Indonesian: Selamat Haji Mubarak Idul Adha (Happy Feast of Sacrifice, Idul Adha)
10. Swahili: Habari ya Siku
